name: Lost Souls
description:
Lost Souls takes you and your friends on an epic adventure! Alone or with friends, but beware of other players.
Gathered supplies - clean the house.
Mined ore - smelt and craft weapons
Neshel portal - activate and explore the dungeon both by yourself and with friends

We Are Waiting For You In Our Game

beautiful Graphics

open World

interesting Dungeons

various Enemies and Bosses

various Treasure Caches

And Much More


This is one of the first games that will be finalized from your wishes and desires. leave feedback and I will make the game the way you want it to be.
